original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo & Cookie Monster Supersized Fun!
overview: Elmo and Cookie Monster Supersized Fun is a Sesame Street DVD released on April 4, 2017.  Bonus features include the full-length episode "Lifting Snuffy," and two printable storybooks - Cookie Monster's Busy Day and Elmo and His Friends.  DVD features Elmo the Grouch Hooper's Lockdown Elmo and the Monarch Butterfly Mucko Polo Elmo the Musical: Prince Elmo the Musical Sesame Ocean Elmozilla Cookie's Crumby Pictures: Cookies of the Caribbean Move It Day Cookie's Crumby Pictures: The Spy Who Loved Cookies Me Am What Me Am Cookie's Crumby Pictures: The Biscotti Kid Still Life with Cookie Cookie's Crumby Pictures: Les Mousserables
title: Sesame Street: Elmo & Cookie Monster Supersized Fun!
